bibl.title: Waterway Fayum-Alexandria. A Note on P. Lille I 1 (= P. Zen. Pest., Appendix A).
bibl.note: P. Lille I, 1 = Pap. Lugd.-Bat. XX, App. A. Identification of a canal that constituted an extension of the Bahr Yusuf to the north, used as the most convenient waterway connecting the Fayum with the Delta, especially with Alexandria.
DERDA Tomasz, Waterway Fayum-Alexandria. A Note on P. Lille I 1 (= P. Zen. Pest., Appendix A).
